page.title: 08EDUCATION Age Ranges
page.content: The{earliest school}recorded was a church school in Leylands Road to the North of Burgess Hill.The site is still standing.{Nowadays}there are several Primary,one Community School and a school for children with special needs. Some children go to an{infant}school from 5 to 7,and then a{junior}school from 7 to 11,others go to a {Primary school from 5 to 11. The{Community School}takes most children from 11 to 16, then they travel to Haywards Heath for the {Sixth Form College}until they are 18. There is also a Catholic Primary school,St.Wilfrid's, from where most children go to St.Paul's in Haywards Heath. There are a few private, fee-paying schools in the town,and Hurstpierpoint College outside it.
